The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "It" (pronoun referring to the paragraph's topic)
* "is" (linking verb)
* "worth noting" (adverbial phrase)
* "slightly" (adverb)
* "broadened" (verb)
* "without" (preposition)
* "any" (determiner)
* "obvious" (adjective)
* "red-shift" (noun phrase)

The only entity that clearly refers to a material property is "maxima absorption values".
